review: We purchased Chromecast for the bedroom and Amazon Fire TV for the Den (where we watch TV).  We like the Amazon Fire TV so much we plan to get another one for the bedroom and move the Chromecast to the living room. We have a home theater system with a hub, but Amazon Fire TV's interface is so much easier to use and what you get from Amazon Prime made cutting the cable cord painless.

review: We love it.  It works great.  I first bought an Apple TV that seemed to always be buffering.  My 4 year old son learned the word buffering from owning the AppleTV.  The Amazon Fire TV works great.  Rarely does it ever buffer or anything unless I'm having internet issues (which would be expected).  My only complaint is the voice search doesn't search within apps.  Apple TV's interface is also potentially a touch more user friendly but Fire TV's interface is easy enough.
